data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,700,000 souls in Alipurduar and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Alipurduar, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Alipurduar against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Alipurduar, West Bengal, India.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Alipurduar, West Bengal, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Beg people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help every believer in Alipurduar, West Bengal, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Alipurduar, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, convict the 18,700 believers in Alipurduar to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
